title: Sham-e-Ghazal with Ustad Hamil Ali Khan
dc:creator: Staff Writer
description:
Lahore July 22: The Lahore Arts Council held a musical event titled “Sham-e-Ghazal” at Alhamra Cultural Complex with famous singer UstadHamid Ali Khan. Apart from many attendees, Executive DirectorAlhamra Farhat Jabeen specially participated in Sham-e-Ghazal. Speaking on occasion, E.D LAC said that this evening was organized for people who love Ghazal, adding that the name of Ustad Hamid Ali Khan does not need any introduction. The number of his fans can be appraised from the jam-packed hall. She said that the Ghazal genre has a special place in the music world, and Alhamra has always kept this art alive. Ustad

The post Sham-e-Ghazal with Ustad Hamil Ali Khan appeared first on the Wallet.
